department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Translation services are required for the Translation Bureau
description: The agency will purchase translation services from capable and qualified translation suppliers. The translation services will be for immigration, french to english, and will be for a period of two years.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Translation Services**
=============================================

**Reference Number:** PW-__ZF-524-41488
**Solicitation Number:** EP745-240956/A
**Publication Date:** September 11, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** September 15, 2023, 2:00 PM Local Time

**Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
**Procurement Category:** Services - SRV
**Procurement Method:** Competitive Selective Tendering
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
**Limited Tendering Reason:** N/A

**Supply Arrangement:**
The Translation Bureau invites eligible suppliers to submit a bid for the acquisition of translation services for the Immigration sector. The supply arrangement is part of the EP745-230361 - Translation Bureau’s directory of suppliers for translation services of sensitive nature.

**Bid Solicitation:**
The bid solicitation is for the provision of translation services from French to English, with a volume of up to 9,000,000 words. The contract is for a period of two (2) years, with an optional one (1) year extension.

**Eligible Suppliers:**
Only suppliers who are pre-qualified in Tier 3 for the Immigration sector, from French to English, within the Supply Arrangement EP745-230361 are eligible to bid. Nations Translation Group LP is the only pre-qualified supplier for this requirement.

**Submission Instructions:**
Bid solicitation documents will be e-mailed directly to the qualified suppliers who are invited to bid. Inquiries regarding this bid solicitation should be submitted to the Contracting Authority at the following email address: TPSGC.PADDSBT-APRFPTB.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The evaluation will be based on the best overall proposal, considering technical merit and price.

**Documents:**
Documents may be submitted in either English or French, as specified in the bid solicitation documents.

**Contracting Authority:**
Contact: Anick Mongeon, Contracting Officer
Email: anick.mongeon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: (873) 354-4883
Fax: (   )

**Delivery Location:**
National Capital Region (NCR)
